seo: 泛微OA,任意文件读取漏洞,SignatureDownLoad接口,漏洞检测
seo_en: Panwei OA,file read vulnerability,SignatureDownLoad interface,vulnerability detection
summary: 该插件用于检测泛微OA E-Weaver系统中SignatureDownLoad接口的任意文件读取漏洞，通过构造特定请求验证是否存在漏洞并报告结果
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect the arbitrary file read vulnerability in the SignatureDownLoad interface of Panwei OA E-Weaver system. It constructs specific requests to verify the existence of the vulnerability and reports the results
